narrative:
This was a Focused inspection to follow-up on the NCI cited for one animal during the Jun.17, 2015 inspection. 
This animal has been evaluated and treated by a veterinarian.
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representatives and Dr. Margaret Shaver, VMO.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
